yards 440 m 1 skein of caron colorama halo yarn 71% acrylic 18% nylon 11% polyester 481 yards 440 m per 227-gram skein the sample scarf used 1 skein of caron colorama halo yarn in the orchid frost colorway hook 10 mm gauge 6 3 stitches and 4 row = 4 inches 10 cm in double_crochet terms us chain chain yarn over and pull through loop on hook double_crochet double_crochet yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch yarn over pull through two loops yarn over and pull through both loops on hook csdc optional chainless starting double_crochet a method for beginning each row without having to chain 3 this method helps to keep your edges straight see http //www mooglyblog com/chainless-starting-double-crochet/ for a video tutorial st stitch the wedge crochet pattern © 2024 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful pattern notes the shawl is worked in row of double_crochet stitches in us terms increasing by one stitch per row work two stitches into the very first stitch of each row then just one double_crochet in every other stitch across the row the two stitches worked into the very first stitch are a chain 3 and a double_crochet or a chainless starting double_crochet and a double_crochet your choice the wedge pattern tutorial video on youtube https //youtu be/ygblwirzdcs chain 3 row 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook turn 1 double_crochet stitch skipped chain do not count as a double_crochet for this row only row 2 chain 3 or csdc counts as a double_crochet double_crochet in first st which is the same st as csdc or chain 3 turn 2 double_crochet sts row 3 chain 3 or csdc double_crochet in first st double_crochet in each st across turn 3 double_crochet sts row 4-73 chain 3 or csdc double_crochet in first st double_crochet in each st across turn 73 double_crochet sts after row 73 fasten_off and weave in the ends share your wedge with #thewedgeshawl on instagram tag me @prettypeacefulcrochet because i love to see your projects please feel free to
